iut

Class GameItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • iut.GameItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Evoluable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoxGameItem

    public abstract class GameItem
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable, Evoluable
    GameItem : base item of the game Drawable : the item can be drawn Evoluable : the item can change with the time
